summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Lojitek platform MVP - business intelligence solution with admin registration, authentication, and 3 integrated applications (Lotri, Paryaj Sportif, Casino). Backend APIs working with 88.9% success rate, frontend fully functional with complete user flows.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - both status codes indicate authentication failure

passed_tests: Admin registration with all fields (email, password, full_name, id_number, phone, address, photo_base64, terms)
Admin login with JWT token generation
Frontend login page loading and design
Frontend registration page with all form fields
Complete registration flow with backend integration
Dashboard loading with admin name and application cards
UI design matches requirements (navy blue background, orange buttons, glass effects)
JWT authentication integration between frontend and backend
